casebody.data:
BROADNAX
v.
RAMEY. No. 320P15-1. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Jan. 28, 2016. Leroy Courtland Broadnax, Eden, for Broadnax, Leroy Courtland. Kathleen N. Bolton, Assistant Attorney General, for State of N.C. *618Craig Blitzer, District Attorney, for State of N.C.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 10th of September 2015 by Petitioner for Relief from Conviction and Sentence:

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 28th of January 2016."
